child.title: Structure:
child.format: Subject + present form of verb + (s/es) + Object.

child.title: Negative Structure:
child.format: Subject + do/ does + not +  present form of verb + object/Extension.

child.title: Interogative Structure:
child.format: Do/does + subject + present tense form of the verb + object/Extension.

child.title: Negative Interogative Structure:
child.format: Do/Does + Subject + not + Present form of the verb + object/Extension.

child.title: Structure:
child.format: Subject + am/is/are + Present form of verb + ing + Object.

child.title: Negative Structure:
child.format: Subject + am/is/are + not/ Present form of verb + ing +  object/Extension.

child.title: Interogative Structure:
child.format: am/is/are + subject + present form of the verb + ing + object/Extension.

child.title: Negative Interogative Structure:
child.format: am/is/are + Subject + not + Present form of the verb + ing + object/Extension.

child.title: Structure:
child.format: Subject+ have/has + Past Participle Form of Verb + objects.

child.title: Negative Structure:
child.format: Subject + have not/ has not / + Past Participle Form of Verb + object/Extension.

child.title: Interogative Structure:
child.format: Have / Has+Subject + Past Participle Form of Verb + object/Extension.

child.title: Negative Interogative Structure:
child.format: Have/Has+Subject +Not+ Past Participle Form of Verb + object/Extension.

child.title: Structure:

child.title: Negative Structure:
child.format: Subject+ have not been/ has not  been + Present form of  Verb +ing+ Object+ for/since+ Time.

child.title: Interogative Structure:

child.title: Negative Interogative Structure:
child.format: Have / Has +Subject +not been + Present form of Verb +ing+ Object+ for/since+ Time.

child.title: Structure:

child.title: Structure:
